title: Sniper Elite
fullContent: Home› SniperSniper EliteBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenYou take the role of an elite shooter in Sniper Elite, whose mission is to take down every enemy. The shooting precision skills are important to handle any situation against the ninja masters.Each level comes up with unique environments with growing difficulty that kill challenge your reaction and speed.The shooting precision is very important when you want to eliminate the enemy. Grab the weapon and have fun while shooting.Sniper Elite Controls:Press and hold Left/Right mouse button to aimRelease Left/Right mouse button while aiming to shootEmbed URL:https://www.onlinegames.io/games/2021/1/sniper-elite/index.htmlThis article was updated on May 9, 20241 Player2DEmbeddableFirst Person ShooterFreeFunGunHTML5MobileMouseShootingSniperWeapon
